title: CIM Graph Generated Event Schema
description: Schema for the CimGraphGenerated event published when a CIM graph is generated from domain information

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the CIM graph was generated

agent_id.description: Unique identifier of the domain collection agent

session_id.description: Unique identifier for the collection session

graph_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated CIM graph

domain_name.description: Name of the domain this graph represents

file_path.description: File system path where the CIM graph is stored

format_version.description: Version of the CIM graph format used

entity_count.description: Number of entities in the generated graph

component_count.description: Number of components in the generated graph

relationship_count.description: Number of relationships in the generated graph

complexity_score.description: Assessed complexity level of the domain graph

version.description: Version of the domain collection agent

cim_compliant.description: Whether the graph adheres to CIM standards

invariants_satisfied.description: List of CIM invariants that are satisfied
